Synonyms.Synonym: Incomplete unilateral aplasia of the Müllerian ducts

TextSection.Contents: A rare non-syndromic uterovaginal malformation characterized by a crescent-shaped small-sized uterus containing a single horn and fallopian tube associated with a rudimentary second horn (which can be solid or contain a cavity with functioning endometrium and be communicating or non-communicating). Urinary tract anomalies are frequently associated.

Parent.Label: Unilateral aplasia of the Müllerian ducts
